Title: Adaptation
Description: To help an enterprise adapt and restructure, e.g. so that they can start new activities.

Title: Bridging Finance
Description: To help provide adequate cash flow for an enterprise.

Title: Entrepreneurial Support
Description: To help establish a business idea.

Title: Growth and Sustainability
Description: To support the expansion in the scale of an enterprise's activities so that it is able to achieve greater sustainability.

Title: Social Impact
Description: To help an enterprise increase the social impact of its activities.

Title: Capital Purchase
Description: To help an enterprise with acquisition of large capital assets.

Title: Investment Readiness
Description: To provide extra support which can help an enterprise to secure further investment.
